define.name: nof_global_l2_gport_lifs
define.doc: The mpls and vlan ports don't have enough bits to support the full global lif address. Their number is limited by this value.

define.name: glem_rif_optimization_enabled
define.doc: Amount of out RIFs one GLEM entry can hold for optimized GLEM usage is 4.

numeric.name: nof_global_in_lifs
numeric.doc: Number of in global lifs in the device.

numeric.name: nof_global_out_lifs
numeric.doc: Number of out global lifs in the device.

numeric.name: nof_glem_lines
numeric.doc: Number of entries in the GLEM. This is the maximum number of egress global lifs in the system.

define.name: inlif_index_bit_size
define.doc: This is the size of a single index in the inlif table. Divide the entry bit size by this to get its size in indexes.

define.name: inlif_minimum_index_size
define.doc: The minimum size in indexes of an inlif entry

define.name: inlif_resource_tag_size
define.doc: The size of the inlif resource's n-packs. The packs are used to prevent fragmentation by assigning each pack a fixed entry size. The pack should be the least common denominator of every possible entry side. See the SDD for full description.

define.name: nof_in_lif_profiles
define.doc: Number of possible in_lif profiles.

define.name: nof_used_in_lif_profile_bits
define.doc: Number of used in_lif_profile bits out of 8.

define.name: nof_used_eth_rif_profile_bits
define.doc: Number of used eth_rif_profile bits.

define.name: nof_in_lif_incoming_orientation
define.doc: Number of possible in_lif profile incoming orientation groups.

define.name: nof_eth_rif_profiles
define.doc: Number of possible eth_rif profiles.

define.name: nof_da_not_found_destination_profiles
define.doc: Number of da_not_found_destination profiles.

define.name: default_da_not_found_destination_profile
define.doc: Default da_not_found_destination profile.

define.name: drop_in_lif
define.doc: local in_lif id performing trap with drop action.

numeric.name: nof_dpc_local_in_lifs
numeric.doc: Number of duplicate per core local inlifs in the device. This value is per core, so the overall number is twice that.

numeric.name: dpc_local_inlif_array_sw_size
numeric.doc: Size of sw array needed for dpc local inlif. This value is for the whole system, and not just per core.

numeric.name: dpc_local_inlif_hash_sw_size
numeric.doc: Size of sw hash table needed for dpc local inlif. This value is for the whole system, and not just per core.

numeric.name: nof_sbc_local_in_lifs
numeric.doc: Number of shared by cores local inlifs in the device.

numeric.name: sbc_local_inlif_array_sw_size
numeric.doc: Size of sw array needed for sbc local inlif.

numeric.name: sbc_local_inlif_hash_sw_size
numeric.doc: Size of sw hash table needed for sbc local inlif.

numeric.name: all_local_inlifs_array_sw_size
numeric.doc: Size of sw array needed for dpc + sbc local inlifs. This value is for the whole system, and not just per core.

numeric.name: all_local_inlif_hash_sw_size
numeric.doc: Size of sw hash table needed for dpc local inlif. This value is for the whole system, and not just per core.

numeric.name: in_lif_profile_allocate_orientaion
numeric.doc: number of bits needed for egress property in_lif_orientation in in_lif_profile

numeric.name: in_lif_profile_allocate_policer_inner_dp
numeric.doc: number of bits needed for egress property ive_inner_qos_dp_profile in in_lif_profile.

numeric.name: in_lif_profile_allocate_policer_outer_dp
numeric.doc: number of bits needed for egress property ive_outer_qos_dp_profile in in_lif_profile.

numeric.name: in_lif_profile_allocate_same_interface_mode
numeric.doc: number of bits needed for egress property in_lif_profile_allocate_same_interface_mode in in_lif_profile.

define.name: nof_out_lif_profiles
define.doc: Number of possible out_lif profiles.

define.name: nof_out_lif_outgoing_orientation
define.doc: Number of possible out_lif profile outgoing orientation groups.

define.name: outlif_pointer_size
define.doc: The number of bits in the outlif pointer used in the system.

define.name: local_outlif_width
define.doc: The number of bits in the local outlif from GLEM.

define.name: outlif_profile_width
define.doc: The number of bits in the outlif profile from GLEM.

define.name: glem_result
define.doc: The number of bits in GLEM result.

define.name: nof_local_out_lifs
define.doc: Number of potential local outlifs in the device. Derived from the pointer size.

define.name: allocation_bank_size
define.doc: Size of the outlif bank used by the outlif allocation algorithm.

define.name: physical_bank_pointer_size
define.doc: How many bits from the outlif pointer are used to indicate the physical bank.

define.name: physical_bank_size
define.doc: Size of the outlif bank used by the phase map and mags. Derived from the outlif pointer size and the physical bank pointer size.

table.name: logical_to_physical_phase_map
table.doc: Map outlif logical phase to physical phase. The reverse mapping is implied from this.

define.name: max_nof_lif_tables
define.doc: Maximal number of logical lif tables (inlif + outlif)

define.name: max_nof_result_types
define.doc: Maximal number of result types in lif table

define.name: max_fields_per_result_type
define.doc: Maximal number of fields for one result types in lif table
